Welcome!

 The goal of the application is to create bunches of flashcards that can help you memorize what you need.

 How does it work?

 First thing to do, create a deck:
 • press the button: ADD DECK
 • insert the name of the deck and, if you want, also a tag or a short description
 • press OK

 Second, add some cards:
 • at the bottom right, press the button with a "+"
 • fill in the fields*
 • press OK

 Third thing, play: pressing PLAY you can start a game. A question will appear, when you think you know the answer click on ROTATE, if you have done correctly press the green button, otherwise the red one.
 At the end of the cards you will be able to see your result.

 *nb: Empty cards cannot be added and there may be a problem with the selection of images, repeat the procedure in case of error. To change the card just click on it.

 nnb: The name and tag of the collection cannot be edited.
